author: SomeOrdinaryGamers
description:
Hello guys and gals, it's me Mutahar again! This time we take a look at the recent Nintendo Switch 2 Direct and while Nintendo has played it safe with the upgrades, the increase in game prices and normalization of the worst forms of DRM is something I want to touch upon. Thanks for watching!
Like, Comment and Subscribe for more videos!
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Is Disappointing...
